name: ChatBox
author: kafeijao
description:
Communicate with other people in the instance using Text and **ChatBox**es!

__**Features**__
- Press `Y` or BTKUI button in the Misc section to send messages.
- Use [VRBindings](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/174) to allow choosing a SteamVR Binding.
- Heavily customizable via BKTUI settings menu in the Misc section.
- Modify the notification sounds by replacing the files at `/UserData/Chatbox/`
- Use bool animator param `ChatBox/Typing` or `#ChatBox/Typing`
- View the ChatBox History window via the BTKUI button in the Misc section.
- Press `Arrow up`/`Arrow down` to iterate through the sent messages. You can also click `Prev` if you're in VR.
- Press `Tab` or `Auto` in VR to attempt to auto-complete usernames.
- Use `@target-username` to mention people in messages.
- Self moderation for individual players.
- Profanity filter (needs to be populated).

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/ChatBox) for more in-depth info.

**Optional Requirements**
- [VRBinding](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/174)
